mapper.update: update user set ur_openid = #{ur_openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ur_wechat_id = #{ur_wechat_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ur_phone = #{ur_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ur_nickname = #{ur_nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ur_unionid = #{ur_unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ur_scores = #{ur_scores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ur_creation = #{ur_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ur_lastupdated = #{ur_lastupdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ur_id = #{ur_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ur_id, ur_openid, ur_wechat_id, ur_phone, ur_nickname, ur_unionid, ur_scores, ur_creation, ur_lastupdated from user where ur_id = #{ur_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
